description: Fiery harissa gives this bean stew a real kick and lots of middle eastern flavour.
name: Harissa Mixed Bean Stew Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour over the chopped tomatoes and a can of water and stir in the apricots and honey. Simmer for 15-20 minutes until the vegetables and beans are tender and the sauce has reduced. Serve with fresh coriander on top.
